description: Entry server handler for a Remix.run application, responsible for server-side rendering and request handling, including bot detection and streaming HTML response generation.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bot user agents, and delegates request processing accordingly.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from bots by rendering the Remix server to a stream and returning the HTML response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers by rendering the Remix server to a stream and returning the HTML response.
